Text: The Hassan II Mosque or Grande Mosquée Hassan II (Arabic: مسجد الحسن الثاني‎ ‎ ; colloquially the "Casablanca Hajj") is a mosque in Casablanca, Morocco.

Triplets:<The Hassan II Mosque
1:
--------------------
Text: Hassan II Mosque:  It is the largest mosque in Morocco and the 13th largest in the world.
Triplets:<Hassan II Mosque
3:
--------------------
Text: Hassan II Mosque:  Completed in 1993, it was designed by Michel Pinseau and built by Bouygues.
Triplets:<Hassan II Mosque
5:
--------------------
Text: Hassan II Mosque:
Triplets:<Hassan II Mosque
6:
--------------------
Text: Hassan II Mosque:  The walls are of hand-crafted marble and the roof is retractable.
